info.name: Trainingtech
info.description: Welcome to style, I have make this style for a training web site which provides Ruby on Rails certification. ruby on rails certification validates your expertise in building robust web applications using the Ruby on Rails framework. It showcases your proficiency in developing scalable, efficient, and maintainable web solutions, making you a sought-after professional in the tech industry. With this certification, you demonstrate mastery in creating database-backed web applications and understanding key Rails concepts like MVC architecture, RESTful routing, and ActiveRecord. Boost your career prospects and credibility as a Ruby on Rails developer with this recognized certification.
